title: Asset Property Specification
description: Defines what properties are available in asset files.

anyOf.title: A flag which does not have a value.
An integer from 0 to 255 inclusive.
An integer from 0 to 65535 inclusive.
An integer from 0 to 4294967295 inclusive.
An integer from 0 to 18446744073709551615 inclusive.
An integer from -128 to 127 inclusive.
An integer from -32768 to 32767 inclusive.
An integer from -2147483648 to 2147483647 inclusive.
Zero or more characters of UTF-16 text.
Single-precision floating point decimal.
Double-precision floating point decimal.
Quadruple-precision floating point decimal.
True or false value.
A single UTF-16 character.
A type that exists in the base game.
A Globally Unique Identifier (also called a UUID).
A Globally Unique Identifier (also called a UUID).
A reference to a Unity object in the specified masterbundle. Exact same as MasterBundleReference.
A reference to a Unity object in the specified masterbundle. Exact same as ContentReference.
An asset GUID or short ID.
A UTC date and time.
A Vector3 position (X, Y, Z) or object.
A Vector3 position (X, Y, Z), object, or Key_X, Key_Y, Key_Z properties.
A Vector3 position Key_X, Key_Y, Key_Z properties.
A Vector3 scale (X, Y, Z) or object.
A Vector3 scale (X, Y, Z), object, or Key_X, Key_Y, Key_Z properties.
A Vector3 scale Key_X, Key_Y, Key_Z properties.
A Vector3 euler rotation (X, Y, Z) or object.
A Vector3 euler rotation (X, Y, Z), object, or Key_X, Key_Y, Key_Z properties.
A Vector3 euler rotation Key_X, Key_Y, Key_Z properties.
A list of values.
A dictionary of values.
The name of a .masterbundle file.
The name of a .unity3d file.
The version of an asset bundle or master bundle.

Key.description: The key of the flag or property.

SingleKeyOverride.description: If 'KeyIsRegex', the singular version of the key which would not be regex (ex. Blade for Blade_1).

KeyIsRegex.description: If 'Key' is a regex expression to match properties.

KeyGroups.description: If 'KeyIsRegex', then this is a list of groups by name to match with other properties within the given regex group.

RegexGroup.description: The regex group (starting from 1) that acts as the identifier for this group.

Name.description: Unique name of this group (amongst the this asset type's hierarchy).

Count.description: Number of keys to look for, can be a property from the asset.

Aliases.description: Other keys that can be used for the flag or property.

ElementType.description: The type of the elements of a DatList.

SpecialTypes.description: A special subset of element type, such as barricade or useable type.

CanBeInMetadata.description: If this property can be read from the Metadata section.

DefaultValue.description: The default value for this property if applicable. If IncludedDefaultValue is used, this indicates the default value if the property is not included.

IncludedDefaultValue.description: The default value for this property if applicable. Indicates the default value if the property is included but not parsed correctly.

Variable.description: Name of the variable in the C# class.

Markdown.description: Longer markdown description of the property.

Minimum.description: Inclusive minimum value of the property.

Maximum.description: Inclusive maximum value of the property.

Deprecated.description: If this property shouldn't be used anymore or was left in for legacy features.

Type.description: Assembly-qualified name of the asset type.

Category.description: Category of the asset, if any.

DisplayName.description: Display name of the type of asset.

Parent.description: Assembly-qualified name of the parent asset type, or null for Asset.

Properties.description: List of all properties that can be defined.

Localization.description: List of all localization properties that can be defined.

BundleAssets.description: List of all assets loaded from Unity bundles with an expected name.

AssetName.description: The name of the asset in Unity.

SingleAssetNameOverride.description: If 'AssetNameIsRegex', the singular version of the asset name which would not be regex.

AssetNameIsRegex.description: If 'AssetName' is a regex expression to match properties.

Count.description: Number of assets to look for, can be a property from the asset.

AssetNameGroups.description: If 'AssetNameIsRegex', then this is a list of groups by name to match with other properties within the given regex group.

RegexGroup.description: The regex group (starting from 1) that acts as the identifier for this group.

Name.description: Unique name of this group (amongst the this asset type's hierarchy).

Description.description: Description of what the prefab does.

Deprecated.description: If the prefab is no longer used or has been swapped for newer prefab features.

Required.description: If the prefab is required to exist (or doesn't make sense to not exist).

Type.description: The fully qualified type of unity asset to load.

AnimationComponentFindArgument.description: The child GameObject that should have the Animation component attached.

Animations.description: List of animations that can be available on the Animation component.

Name.description: The name of the animation in Unity.

SingleNameOverride.description: If 'NameIsRegex', the singular version of the name which would not be regex.

NameIsRegex.description: If 'Name' is a regex expression to match properties.

NameGroups.description: If 'NameIsRegex', then this is a list of groups by name to match with other properties within the given regex group.

RegexGroup.description: The regex group (starting from 1) that acts as the identifier for this group.

Name.description: Unique name of this group (amongst the this asset type's hierarchy).

Count.description: Number of animations to look for, can be a property from the asset.

Value.description: The name of the enum field.

Description.description: Description of what the enum value does.

Properties.description: List of all properties that can be defined.
